blocks.text: Olympic Gold Hunt: Klaebo and Biathlon Relay Lead Wednesday's Action

Norway's Winter Olympics medal chase intensifies with two prime opportunities. Klaebo is the overwhelming favorite in team sprint, while the women's biathlon relay eyes the podium with Tandrevold and Kirkeeide.
